title: Glamour
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Glamour''' was an ability which [[grey elves]] received upon reaching level 5. When used, it would attempt to [[confusion|confuse]], [[paralyze]], [[enslave]], or [[fear|frighten]] nearby humanoids.

==History==
Grey elves lost the ability to use Glamour in [[0.4]].

[[Category:Obsolete]]
